name: StLouisEncephalitisVirusInfectionTestsForSaintLouisEncephalitisVirusIgMAntibody
title: St. Louis Encephalitis Virus Infection (Tests for Saint Louis encephalitis virus IgM Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of St. Louis Encephalitis Virus IgM),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: St. Louis Encephalitis Virus IgM;   

LOINC Search terms: ‘Saint Louis Encephalitis Virus IgM Ab -(culture OR isolation)’),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
